description: Translates Red Lanterns #0, 8-12 & Stormwatch #9.
name: Exodus

deck: Collecting two important chapters of Batman's history: 'Batman and Son', and 'Batman The Black Glove' in one hardcover.
description:
The ever-victorious Dark Knight has faced many clear and present evils - The Joker, Two-Face, Scarecrow - but can he be ready for terrors that remain unseen?

In this startling collection, Batman is revealed to be a Father! Talia, the daughter of archvillain Ra's Al Ghul, appears with a young boy named Damian who she claims is the Dark Knight's son. Determined to do the right thing, Bruce Wayne takes in the young boy, but thanks to the indoctrination of the League of Assassins, this angry child hides sinister depths...

Meanwhile, a menacing adversary known only as the Black Glove is hellbent on manipulating Batman behind the scenes - he has carefully placed a traitorous mole in the midst of a group of heroes, dedicated to Batman-like acts. The Black Glove is brilliant and utterly evil, and is the man who will eventually be responsible for the Dark Knight's death in a story that culminates in BATMAN R.I.P.

To stop this malicious mastermind, Batman must push the limits both mentally and physically. Will he be able to rip free the blinds and see the evils lurking around him?

From the inspired minds of comics guru Grant Morrison (ACTION COMICS, ALL STAR SUPERMAN) and artists Andy Kubert (FLASHPOINT), J.H. Williams III (BATWOMAN) and Tony S.Daniel (DETECTIVE COMICS) comes an astonishing tale of Batman's darkest hours.
name: Batman The Black Glove Deluxe

description:

description: Packaged with Arcee at Target.
Packaged with Space Case at Target
Packaged with Starscream at Target.
Packaged with Bumblebee at Target

A 'Fear Itself' chapter! The Avengers Academy students are trapped in Underspace with the deadly Absorbing Man and Titania – can they survive, or will a sacrifice have to be made...? By Christos Gage and Tom Raney!

Plus: 'Fear Itself' continues! Elektra and the Shroud battle an army of escaped super-convicts! By Dan Abnett, Andy Lanning and Kyle Hotz!

Collects:

  • Avengers Academy #18
  • Avengers Academy #19
  • Heroes for Hire #10

Free multi-part Iron Man poster in this issue!

A new era of X-citement begins here! Wolverine, Kitty Pryde and the Beast found a new mutant school, but the Hellfire Club plans to turn opening day into a disaster! By Jason Aaron and Chris Bachalo!

Also: Cyclops's X-team battles Mr Sinister as the dreaded Celestials arrive on Earth!

Includes material from Wolverine and the X-Men (2011) #01-02 & Uncanny X-Men (vol 2) #03.
Featuring the Spider-Man newspaper strip.

All You Need Is Blood! A Hard Day’s Fight! Penny Slain! Yes, pop pickers, these and many more lethal hits are winging their way to you with Zombo: Planet Zombo by Al Ewing and Henry Flint in 2000 AD Prog 1828!

Also in this week’s Prog – is Judge Hamida getting forgetful or has her new foe claimed Mega-City One’s greatest lawman? The plot thickens in Stickleback: Number of the Beast! And have the ne’er-do-wells found their prize only to lose it again in Tharg’s 3rillers: The Ghostship Mathematica?

Cover: Henry Flint (Zombo)

  • Judge Dredd - Suicide Watch (part 3) (Gordon Rennie and Emma Beeby - Paul Davidson)
  • Dandridge - The Copper Conspiracy (part 5) (Alec Worley - Warren Pleece)
  • Tharg's 3rillers - The Ghostship Mathematica (part 2) (David Baillie - Inaki Miranda)
  • Stickleback - Number of the Beast (part 5) (Ian Edginton - D'Israeli)
  • Zombo - Planet Zombo (part 4) (Al Ewing - Henry Flint)
name: Prog 1828
